about_the_game:
The most mind-blowing RPG Maker game from Thailand.
With metafiction narrative.
Innovatively unique gameplay and presentation.
Don't sleep on it. You must play this!

This game was created by on of the best Thai indie game developer.
who is like the Wizard of the RPG Maker community.
who can create the RPG Maker game as they wish in a unique way.
Guaranteed quality with almost 10 years of experience in the Thai game industry. 
Along with the names of an expert, experienced, cream of the crop,
top-notch game developer in the RPG Maker Thailand community

Welcome to the world of Wachirawit

This is the world of the game that created from RPG Maker by Wachirawit.
Thai indie game developer with a fighting heart.
He always do his best while making game.
No matter how many obstacles he encountered in his life, he never gave up.
Only an elevator can take him down.

And now you're about to go on an adventure into his game world!

-------------------------------------------------

Adventure In Wachirawit's World

An action JRPG game with a turn-based combat system. Made with RPG Maker.
Even though this was the first game of his life, Wachirawit, the creator of this game, has done his best.
In this game, players gain levels by defeating enemies. To make the character stronger
However, level isn't the most important thing in this game.
Because of skills, items, weapons, and armor, players have to spend money to buy them.
Therefore, this game will focus on you exploring the world created by Wachirawit.
To earn money to make characters stronger instead of just grinding in dungeons.

You play as the siblings, Eric and Emily.
The two will go on an adventure in Wachirawit's World .
To defeat various monsters and demons in this world.

Features
  • Explore the vast realm of Wachirawit's world that created by Wachirawit
  • Exciting turn-based combat system
  • Defeat enemies, collect money and level up. To make the character stronger
  • Meet NPC People
  • Complete quests to receive monetary rewards.
  • Buy items, weapons and armor from the shop to make your character stronger.
  • Skills in the game also require money to buy.

“I bought RPG Maker, and its name says that it was for making RPG games.
If I don't make RPG games, what kind of games should I make then?”
- Wachirawit Ruangsap
Thai indie game developer

Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1109x624 or better Display
